price: Ani ati badii kiyyaafi badii keetiin deebitee warra ibiddaa irraa ta'uun fedha. Kunis mindaa miidhaa hojjattootaati."
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَن تَبُوٓأَ بِإِثۡمِي وَإِثۡمِكَ فَتَكُونَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innī urīdu an tabūa bi-ith'mī wa-ith'mika fatakūna min aṣḥābi al-nāri wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
